title: konfabulator widget
content:
not sure if anyone is interested but in the absence of any whizzy typophile dashboard widgets i have posted a konfabulator rss reader as a temporary measure. just a simple stop gap.

[http://www.widgetgallery.com/view.php?widget=36932](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123015827/http:/www.widgetgallery.com/view.php?widget=36932)
author: mijlee

comments.content:
Interesting… But doesn´t seem to work.  
Maybe it is just me?

you need to install konfabulator first. it is now free and there are some very useful widgets that are not yet available in dashboard.

do you have it?

[http://www.konfabulator.com/download](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123015827/http:/www.konfabulator.com/download)

If I had Tiger I would have done already ;)

Think some other bods here have some rather whizzy ideas in the pipeline so keep checking the forums and badger them to complete it.

[http://typophile.com/node/14265](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123015827/http:/typophile.com/node/14265)
